title: Granted By Fragment
description: Reusable definitions for capturing the origin events that grant a skill, item, or similar asset.

type.description: Category of the grant source (system, quest, title, etc.).

name.description: Specific name of the granting source (e.g., quest title, item name).

from.description: Optional source identifier (e.g., previous class or skill).

to.description: Optional target identifier when the grant upgrades or replaces something.

notes.description: Clarifying details that don’t fit other structured fields.

granted_by.description: One or more origin events that granted the entity.
